scripts.version:show:
echo '

		This extension is currently in version '$(echo $npm_package_version)'

'
scripts.build:chrome: BROWSER=chrome NODE_ENV=production webpack && mkdir build && zip -r build/nepali-date-v$npm_package_version-chrome-production.zip production
scripts.build:firefox: BROWSER=firefox NODE_ENV=production webpack && mkdir build && cd production && zip -r ../build/nepali-date-v$npm_package_version-firefox-production.xpi assets manifest.json
